---
output: odt_document
---

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
access=read.csv("Enteroctopodidae_and_Outgroup.csv",na.strings = "")
colnames(access)=c("NA.","X12s","COIII","Cytb","notes")
access=access[,1:4] #Dropping the notes column
access=access[complete.cases(access)|access$NA.=="Octopus_rubescens",] 
access=access[!grepl("_\\d",access$NA.),]
access.kable=access
colnames(access.kable)=c("species","12s","COIII","CytB")
access.kable$species=gsub("_"," ",access.kable$species)
kable(access.kable,row.names = F,align=c("l","c","c","c"))
```
